mileage_logic_text.100000: The 'danger zone' for the 3.5L EcoBoost. If you hear a cold start rattle, it's likely Cam Phasers (,000+).
mileage_logic_text.150000: At 150k miles, the 10-speed transmission becomes volatile. Fluid flush is mandatory.
mileage_logic_text.200000: You are in 'Bonus Time'. Major failure exceeds vehicle value. Do not invest heavily.

mileage_logic_text.100000: AFM (Active Fuel Management) lifter failure risk begins. Listen for ticking noise at idle. Disabling AFM can prevent catastrophic failure.
mileage_logic_text.150000: The 6L80 transmission is the weak link. Expect torque converter shudder. Fluid flush with Mobil1 Synthetic LV ATF HP may extend life.
mileage_logic_text.200000: If the truck has survived this long without major issues, it's a keeper. Budget for suspension refresh.

mileage_logic_text.80000: Check for the 'Hemi Tick' (exhaust manifold bolt failure). If present, repair before it causes further damage.
mileage_logic_text.180000: TIPM (Totally Integrated Power Module) electrical issues become common. Sell if you see random electrical gremlins.
mileage_logic_text.120000: Air suspension (if equipped) is living on borrowed time. Budget ,500 for coil spring conversion.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Robust platform. Torque converter shudder may appear; fluid service () often fixes it.
mileage_logic_text.250000: Engine is fine, but suspension bushings are likely shot. Repair only if keeping for 3+ years.
mileage_logic_text.180000: Check water pump and alternator. Only these prevent it from reaching 300k miles.

mileage_logic_text.80000: Starter failure risk is high. If V6, install 'VCM Muzzler' to stop oil consumption.
mileage_logic_text.150000: CVT/Auto transmission is the limit. If shifting smooth, keep driving. If slipping, sell.
mileage_logic_text.200000: Exceptional longevity. Major repairs are rare if maintained.

mileage_logic_text.100000: You are now in the CVT danger zone. Any whining or hesitation means imminent failure.
mileage_logic_text.120000: CVT replacement cost (,200) often exceeds vehicle value. Sell before it fails.
mileage_logic_text.60000: CVT fluid service is MANDATORY. If skipped, transmission failure is almost guaranteed.

mileage_logic_text.100000: The 'JATCO Cliff'. CVT failure probability spikes >40%. A ,500 repair on a ,000 car is unwise.
mileage_logic_text.140000: Sell immediately if any whining noise appears. Residual value drops near scrap levels.
mileage_logic_text.60000: If CVT fluid wasn't changed at 30k/60k, the transmission is on borrowed time.

mileage_logic_text.100000: A/C condenser may leak. Extended warranty covers this if eligible. Verify VIN.
mileage_logic_text.150000: CVT fluid should be changed by now. If shifting is smooth, expect long life.
mileage_logic_text.60000: 1.5T engine oil dilution issue. Check if software update 18-137 was applied. Change oil more frequently.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Arguably the most reliable car in this mileage bracket. Just do spark plugs and coolant flush.
mileage_logic_text.250000: The transmission may whine slightly but will likely outlast your patience. Keep driving.
mileage_logic_text.180000: Check rear suspension bushings. Common wear item at this point.

mileage_logic_text.80000: VTC actuator 'grinding on cold start' is common. Annoying but not immediately dangerous. Will stretch timing chain over time.
mileage_logic_text.180000: Check all motor mounts. Vibration at idle often indicates worn mounts, not engine issues.
mileage_logic_text.120000: Starter motor failure is imminent if not already replaced. OEM Honda starter recommended.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Torque converter shudder may appear. Often fixed with transmission fluid change (). Don't ignore it.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Check water pump for pink residue. Replace proactively to avoid overheating.
mileage_logic_text.200000: Bulletproof platform. If maintained, expect another 100k miles. Only replace wear items.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Transmission shift flare is common. Software update helps but doesn't fully fix. Live with it or go manual.
mileage_logic_text.150000: INSPECT THE FRAME. Rust is the Tacoma killer, not mechanicals. If frame is solid, keep forever.
mileage_logic_text.250000: The 3.5L V6 is just getting broken in. These trucks regularly hit 300k+ with basic maintenance.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Water pump is the primary failure point. Replace proactively at 100k to avoid stranding.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Check sunroof drains for clogs. Water intrusion can cause expensive electrical damage.
mileage_logic_text.200000: Transmission is the limiting factor. If it shifts clean, this SUV has another 100k in it.

mileage_logic_text.80000: Death Wobble starts here. Replace track bar, ball joints, and steering stabilizer.
mileage_logic_text.180000: The 3.6L Pentastar is solid. Keep on Jeeping - these hold value exceptionally well.
mileage_logic_text.120000: TIPM (electrical module) failure causes random stalling. Common and expensive.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Quadra-Lift air suspension leaks common. Convert to coil springs (,500) rather than fixing (+).
mileage_logic_text.180000: TIPM electrical gremlins expected. Sell if electronics act up.
mileage_logic_text.140000: Pentastar 3.6L may develop 'Tick' (rocker arms). Listen carefully.

mileage_logic_text.100000: 6F35 transmission is the Achilles heel. If slipping occurs, repair cost often exceeds vehicle value.
mileage_logic_text.140000: If you've made it this far without major issues, you got lucky. Don't push your luck further.
mileage_logic_text.60000: 1.5L/1.6L EcoBoost engines have coolant intrusion risk. Watch for white smoke. Avoid if possible.

mileage_logic_text.80000: CRITICAL: Check oil for 'chocolate milk' appearance. Internal water pump failure destroys engine.
mileage_logic_text.120000: PTU (Power Transfer Unit) needs fluid change every 30k. If ignored, expect grinding and failure.
mileage_logic_text.160000: Transmission shudder is common. Flush with Mercon ULV may help, but plan for eventual rebuild.

mileage_logic_text.60000: 1.5T turbo engine may show oil consumption. Monitor levels between changes.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Transmission shudder is common. Fluid change with friction modifier often helps.
mileage_logic_text.150000: If no major issues by now, the 1.5T has proven itself. Budget for turbo inspection.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Identical AFM lifter issue as Silverado. Consider AFM delete if rebuilding.
mileage_logic_text.150000: A/C condenser failure is common. Budget for replacement.
mileage_logic_text.200000: Transmission shudder fix: Use factory-approved friction modifier additive.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Exhaust manifold leak is common. Listen for ticking on cold start. Not urgent but annoying.
mileage_logic_text.250000: The 4.0L V6 is legendary for longevity. These regularly exceed 300k miles.
mileage_logic_text.180000: Air injection pump recall - verify VIN coverage. Check engine light may appear.

mileage_logic_text.80000: VCM (Variable Cylinder Management) causes oil consumption. Consider VCM Muzzler install.
mileage_logic_text.105000: Timing belt is due. This is interference engine - failure destroys valves.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Transmission judder may appear. Fluid changes with Honda DW-1 often resolve.

mileage_logic_text.80000: Check for daytime running light recall. LED failure is common but covered.
mileage_logic_text.180000: These engines easily reach 200k+ with proper care. Excellent long-term value.
mileage_logic_text.120000: SKYACTIV engine is remarkably reliable. Just do regular maintenance.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Check oil consumption. The FA series engines are known for burning oil between changes.
mileage_logic_text.150000: CVT extended warranty (100k miles) may have expired. Budget for potential replacement ().
mileage_logic_text.60000: CVT fluid change is MANDATORY. Skipping this leads to premature CVT failure.

mileage_logic_text.100000: FB20 engine oil consumption varies. Monitor oil level every 1000 miles.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Head gasket issues of older Subarus are mostly resolved, but check for coolant smell.
mileage_logic_text.60000: Same CVT as Outback. Fluid change is critical. Use only Subaru CVT fluid.
Dual-clutch transmission hesitation is normal characteristic, not a defect.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Nu 2.0 engine is safe. Gamma/Theta engines are the problem motors.
mileage_logic_text.150000: If engine hasn't failed by now, you're likely past the danger zone.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Dual-clutch (DCT) hesitation from stop is characteristic, not a defect. Software updates help.
mileage_logic_text.150000: If engine hasn't failed by now and you have service records, you're likely in the clear.
mileage_logic_text.60000: Theta II engine recall: Verify if your VIN was covered and if engine was replaced. Critical safety issue.
Check VIN for Theta II engine recall. Engine seizure risk exists.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Transmission shudder may develop. Fluid change helps.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Solid platform if engine survived. Keep up with maintenance.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Oil starvation issue causes rod knock. Listen for metallic engine noise at startup.
mileage_logic_text.140000: If maintained properly and no engine issues, these are surprisingly reliable.
mileage_logic_text.60000: Same Theta II engine risk as Tucson. Check recall status immediately.
Same Theta II engine risk. Verify recall status and engine replacement history.
mileage_logic_text.100000: 8-speed transmission is holding up well. No major concerns.
mileage_logic_text.150000: These are proving reliable. Korean quality has improved dramatically.

mileage_logic_text.80000: SKYACTIV engine is exceptionally reliable. Just maintain.
mileage_logic_text.120000: Clutch (manual) may need replacement. Normal wear.
mileage_logic_text.180000: Rust in northern climates is the primary concern, not mechanicals.

mileage_logic_text.40000: DSG service mandatory. Skipping leads to mechatronic failure.
mileage_logic_text.80000: Timing chain tensioner (2.0T) failure is possible on early models.
mileage_logic_text.120000: Water pump is weak point. Replace proactively.

mileage_logic_text.60000: Carbon buildup on TSI engine. Walnut blasting recommended.
mileage_logic_text.80000: Timing chain tensioner on early 2.0T is critical check.
mileage_logic_text.120000: Water pump failure common. Address proactively.

mileage_logic_text.60000: CVT fluid service is MANDATORY. This is survival maintenance.
mileage_logic_text.100000: CVT danger zone begins. Any whining means imminent failure.
mileage_logic_text.120000: CVT replacement ($4000) exceeds vehicle value. Sell before failure.

mileage_logic_text.60000: CVT fluid exchange required. Use only Nissan NS-3.
mileage_logic_text.100000: CVT is the limiting factor. Budget for replacement or exit.
mileage_logic_text.140000: These rarely make it past here without CVT work.

mileage_logic_text.60000: 1.5T may have occasional stalling. Software updates available.
mileage_logic_text.100000: 9-speed transmission shudder is common. Fluid helps.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Solid platform overall. V6 models more reliable than turbo-4.

mileage_logic_text.60000: PTU (Power Transfer Unit) fluid change is critical on AWD models.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Water pump may leak. Internal design means quick action needed.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Transmission shudder may develop. Plan for eventual rebuild.

mileage_logic_text.60000: 9-speed ZF transmission is problematic. Software updates help.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Electrical gremlins common. Check all modules.
mileage_logic_text.150000: 2.4L Tigershark engine may consume oil. V6 is more reliable.

mileage_logic_text.80000: Hemi tick (exhaust manifold bolts) may appear. Not immediately critical.
mileage_logic_text.100000: ZF 8-speed is excellent. Just change fluid.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Suspension refresh needed. Control arms and bushings.

mileage_logic_text.80000: TIPM electrical issues may appear. Random symptoms indicate failure.
mileage_logic_text.100000: A/C condenser failures common. Budget for replacement.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Hemi engine is reliable. Transmission and electronics are concerns.

mileage_logic_text.60000: CVT fluid change is mandatory. Subaru CVT depends on fresh fluid.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Oil consumption on FB20 engine varies. Check levels often.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Head gasket issues of older Subarus mostly resolved in this gen.

mileage_logic_text.60000: Door handle motors may fail. Common issue.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Battery degradation is minimal. Expect 90%+ capacity remaining.
mileage_logic_text.200000: EVs thrive at high mileage. Just brake fluid and coolant.

mileage_logic_text.60000: Heat pump issues in cold weather (early models). Software updates help.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Suspension components may creak. Normal wear.
mileage_logic_text.200000: EV simplicity means long life. Battery remains strong.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Nearly bulletproof. Just do scheduled maintenance.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Brake actuator (hybrid models) may need service.
mileage_logic_text.200000: The gold standard of reliability. Keep driving.

mileage_logic_text.60000: N20/N26 timing chain tensioner is critical. Listen for startup rattle.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Oil leaks from valve cover and oil filter housing are expected.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Expensive repairs become frequent. Budget accordingly or exit.

mileage_logic_text.60000: M274 engine balance shaft failure is possible. Listen for rough idle.
mileage_logic_text.100000: 9G-Tronic transmission may develop issues. Fluid change helps.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Electrical complexity means expensive repairs. Consider selling.

mileage_logic_text.60000: DSG transmission service is mandatory. Don't skip.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Water pump failure is common. Look for coolant leaks.
mileage_logic_text.150000: 2.0T engine is solid if maintained. Keep oil fresh.

mileage_logic_text.100000: AFM lifter failure risk. Same as Silverado/Sierra. Listen for ticking.
mileage_logic_text.120000: Air suspension may need service. Budget for struts.
mileage_logic_text.180000: Transmission shudder may develop. Fluid change helps.

mileage_logic_text.80000: Turbo failure risk on 3.5L EcoBoost increases.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Air suspension may need attention.
mileage_logic_text.150000: These are expensive to repair. Extended warranty recommended.

mileage_logic_text.80000: VCM oil consumption is possible on V6. Install VCM Muzzler.
mileage_logic_text.105000: Timing belt is due. Critical maintenance.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Transmission judder may appear. Fluid service helps.

mileage_logic_text.60000: MT-82 manual transmission (2015-2017) has issues. Tremec swap is popular.
mileage_logic_text.100000: 10-speed auto is reliable. Coyote V8 is bulletproof.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Differential whine may appear. Fluid change helps.

mileage_logic_text.100000: CP4 fuel pump is a ticking time bomb on 6.7L diesel. Install disaster prevention kit.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Front end steering components wear fast. Budget for ball joints and tie rods.
mileage_logic_text.200000: If the 6.7L Powerstroke is still running strong, you have a 400k mile truck.

mileage_logic_text.100000: 68RFE transmission is the weak link. Consider aftermarket upgrades if towing heavy.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Grid heater bolt is a known failure. Delete before it drops into the engine.
mileage_logic_text.250000: The Cummins 6.7L is just getting started. These easily hit 400k+ miles.

mileage_logic_text.60000: Coolant pipes fail. Proactive replacement recommended.
mileage_logic_text.80000: Timing chain service on V8 is expensive ($7500+).
mileage_logic_text.120000: Air suspension components wear. Budget $3k+ for rebuild.
mileage_logic_text.140000: You are at expected end of life. Major repairs exceed value.

mileage_logic_text.70000: Electric water pump failure is common. Replace proactively.
mileage_logic_text.90000: V8 models develop valve stem seal issues. Blue smoke on startup is the sign.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Repair costs escalate rapidly. Extended warranty is essential.

mileage_logic_text.80000: Motor mounts wear. Vibration at idle is the symptom.
mileage_logic_text.100000: PCV valve (oil separator) needs replacement.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Air suspension struts may need replacement. Budget $2k+.

mileage_logic_text.60000: Transmission judder is common early. Fluid change may help temporarily.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Timing belt due. Include water pump replacement - labor is the same.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Sliding door cables and motors wear. Expect replacement costs around $800.

mileage_logic_text.50000: Electrical issues and stalling common on early models.
mileage_logic_text.80000: Hybrid models had head gasket issues. Check if addressed.
mileage_logic_text.120000: Rust is accelerated on early years. Inspect underbody.

mileage_logic_text.100000: AFM/DFM lifter failure is the primary concern. Listen for ticking.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Magnetic ride shocks (if equipped) may need replacement.
mileage_logic_text.200000: If lifters survived, engine will go forever.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Sliding door cable/motor replacement is common. Budget $600.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Transmission may develop slight flare. Not critical.
mileage_logic_text.250000: These regularly hit 300k miles. Keep driving.

mileage_logic_text.60000: Same timing chain tensioner concern as Tiguan.
mileage_logic_text.90000: Updated tensioner required if not already done.
mileage_logic_text.140000: If tensioner survived, the engine is solid.

mileage_logic_text.60000: Oil filter housing gasket is a common leak point. Monitor oil level.
mileage_logic_text.80000: B58 engine is more reliable than previous N-series. Good choice.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Cooling system components age. Budget for hoses and thermostat.

mileage_logic_text.70000: Water pump/thermostat housing is weak point. Watch coolant levels.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Gateway module issues may cause electrical quirks.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Overall solid platform. Maintenance is key.

mileage_logic_text.60000: B1 service is due. Includes many important items.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Suspension bushings wear. Clunking over bumps is the sign.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Air suspension (if equipped) may need attention.

mileage_logic_text.80000: Piston ring issues on 2016 models. Oil consumption indicates problem.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Air suspension may need service on equipped models.
mileage_logic_text.140000: Sensus infotainment can be slow. Software updates help.

mileage_logic_text.60000: Theta II engine fire risk. Check if recall was performed.
mileage_logic_text.90000: Rod bearing test should be done. Listen for knocking on cold start.
mileage_logic_text.150000: If engine survived, the rest is solid. Keep driving.

mileage_logic_text.60000: Same Theta II concerns as Sonata. Verify recall status.
mileage_logic_text.80000: Check for engine knock sensor software update.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Turbo models need more care. NA engines are proving reliable.

mileage_logic_text.60000: 1.5L/2.0L EcoBoost has coolant intrusion risk. Watch for white smoke.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Transmission judder is common. Fluid change may help temporarily.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Shifter cable bushing fails. $10 part, annoying symptom.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Cam tower seals may leak oil. Monitor and address.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Secondary air injection pump may fail. Check engine light common.
mileage_logic_text.300000: The 5.7L V8 is legendary. These easily exceed 400k miles.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Pre-2010 models have SMOD (strawberry milkshake) transmission contamination risk.
mileage_logic_text.120000: Replace radiator preventively if not done. Critical.
mileage_logic_text.200000: VQ40 engine is solid. Frame rust is the killer in northern climates.

mileage_logic_text.80000: Shift to Park message is common. Shifter cable needs adjustment.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Transmission control module issues possible.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Evap purge valve may trigger check engine light.

critical_milestones.description: Spark Plug Service (16 Plugs for V8)

mileage_logic_text.80000: Water pump on V8 models needs attention. Look for weeping.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Hemi tick is common. Not immediately dangerous.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Manual transmission models are bulletproof. Autos need fluid service.

mileage_logic_text.60000: Battery drain issues common. Auxiliary battery may need replacement.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Oil consumption on 2.4L is possible. Monitor levels.
mileage_logic_text.120000: This is near expected lifespan. Major repairs questionable.

mileage_logic_text.100000: Minor trim rattles are the worst complaint. Exceptional reliability.
mileage_logic_text.200000: Toyota TNGA platform is proven. Expect long life.
mileage_logic_text.300000: These regularly exceed 300k miles with basic maintenance.

mileage_logic_text.60000: PDK service is mandatory. Skipping leads to premature clutch wear.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Coolant pipes on turbos are prone to failure. Proactive replacement advised.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Exceptional longevity for a sports car. Maintain and enjoy.

mileage_logic_text.80000: Early E3 models have coolant pipe issues. Check for leaks at every service.
mileage_logic_text.120000: Air suspension may need attention. Budget for strut replacement.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Turbos are the limiting factor. Listen for wastegate rattle.

mileage_logic_text.80000: Early Macans had timing chain tensioner issues. Verify if updated.
mileage_logic_text.100000: PDK is holding up well. Regular fluid changes are key.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Transfer case may leak. Budget for seal replacement.

mileage_logic_text.80000: VR30 engines have gallery gasket concern. Listen for oil starvation ticking.
mileage_logic_text.100000: VQ engines are bulletproof. VR30 turbo needs more care.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Steer-by-wire is controversial but reliable. Electronics age.

mileage_logic_text.60000: CVT fluid change is MANDATORY. Jatco CVT lives or dies by maintenance.
mileage_logic_text.100000: CVT danger zone. Any whining means sell immediately.
mileage_logic_text.120000: CVT failure cost exceeds vehicle value. Do not invest heavily.

mileage_logic_text.60000: N14/N18 timing chain issues. Listen for rattle on cold start.
mileage_logic_text.80000: Clutch wears quickly. Budget for replacement if manual.
mileage_logic_text.100000: You are beyond expected Mini lifespan. Major repairs likely.

mileage_logic_text.60000: Same BMW-sourced engine issues as Cooper. Check timing chain.
mileage_logic_text.100000: ALL4 AWD system needs attention. Transfer case fluid change.
mileage_logic_text.120000: Suspension and bushings will need refresh at this point.

mileage_logic_text.80000: 9-speed transmission may shudder. Fluid change often helps.
mileage_logic_text.100000: A/C condenser is prone to failure. Watch for warm air.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Solid platform overall. Just keep up with maintenance.

mileage_logic_text.60000: CVT is holding up well so far. Regular maintenance is key.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Small turbo builds heat. Check for boost leaks.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Newer platform - long-term data still developing.

mileage_logic_text.60000: Solid so far. Brakes are aggressive - expect pad replacement.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Lambda engines are proving reliable. Keep driving.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Limited long-term data, but Genesis is exceeding expectations.

mileage_logic_text.60000: Too new for major issues. Maintain per schedule.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Early reports are positive. Korean luxury is legit.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Extended warranty transfers - valuable for resale.

mileage_logic_text.60000: 2021 models had some teething issues. 2022+ are solid.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Mechanicals are Hyundai-proven. Luxury bits age.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Excellent value proposition vs German competition.

mileage_logic_text.60000: Best large SUV value in America. No major issues.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Lambda V6 is proving reliable. Transmission holds up.
mileage_logic_text.150000: These are keeping their value exceptionally well.

mileage_logic_text.60000: Early models had cabin oil odor issue. TSB fix available.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Lambda V6 is reliable. No major concerns.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Excellent family SUV. Holding value well.

mileage_logic_text.100000: The Prius just gets started at 100k. Change inverter coolant.
mileage_logic_text.200000: Hybrid battery may show degradation. Refurb options exist.
mileage_logic_text.250000: Legendary longevity. Just maintain and drive forever.

mileage_logic_text.60000: 9-speed may shudder. Fluid change often fixes it.
mileage_logic_text.100000: V6 models more reliable than 4-cylinder turbo.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Solid GM platform. Keep up with maintenance.

mileage_logic_text.60000: 2021 models had some powertrain quirks. Updates fixed most.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Escape platform is proven. No major concerns.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Relatively new model - long-term data developing.

mileage_logic_text.60000: Same Wrangler-based issues. Check for death wobble symptoms.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Pentastar V6 is solid. EcoDiesel has EGR concerns.
mileage_logic_text.150000: These hold value well. Resale is strong.

mileage_logic_text.80000: A/C compressors have early failure. Extended warranty recommended.
mileage_logic_text.100000: T5/T6 engines are solid. 4-cylinder does all the work.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Swedish engineering is durable. Expensive when it breaks.

mileage_logic_text.60000: 2.0T turbo is holding up well. No major concerns.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Honda engineering shines. Reliable platform.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Expect another 100k miles with basic maintenance.

mileage_logic_text.60000: New platform based on RAV4. Toyota reliability expected.
mileage_logic_text.100000: Too new for data, but Lexus track record is excellent.
mileage_logic_text.150000: Expect Lexus-level longevity. Built to last.
